LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: Reiri's actions in the library――

LABEL: 0x2EC
STRING: I had no idea what she'd been doing. I had simply been pushed around by her.

LABEL: 0x332
STRING: If indeed, at that time, Reiri was working to block our communication with the surface...

LABEL: 0x386
STRING: ...Why hadn't I noticed it?

LABEL: 0x3BA
STRING: Even though we were here together...

LABEL: 0x3DC
STRING: Even though I felt suspicious, in the end, I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x428
STRING: Nothing... no.

LABEL: 0x4A1
STRING: It was still too early for regrets.

LABEL: 0x4C9
STRING: Even now, I should be able to reveal everything.

LABEL: 0x50B
STRING: Steeling my resolve, I returned to the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x5EA
STRING: There was a hard sound.

LABEL: 0x602
STRING: I caught sight of Yukari's fist hitting the control panel.

LABEL: 0x634
STRING: Her shoulders slumped, and she gritted her teeth. She looked to be at the end of her rope.

LABEL: 0x6F4
STRING: 「I'm sorry...」

LABEL: 0x714
STRING: 「We've... completely lost contact!」

LABEL: 0x744
STRING: 「There's nothing more I can do.」

LABEL: 0x787
STRING: 「I-It's all right, Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0x7B6
STRING: Touri raised her voice as she listened to the disappointed Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7F6
STRING: She smiled, trying not to let the discouraging mood in the wheelhouse get the better of her.

LABEL: 0x8FF
STRING: 「They got the message that there are still people here...」

LABEL: 0x935
STRING: 「I'm sure rescue will be here soon!」

LABEL: 0xA40
STRING: 「...Even without them knowing our exact situation or location?」

LABEL: 0xA8D
STRING: 「The people who'd come to our rescue must be either stupid or suicidal.」

LABEL: 0xB3F
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri, that's enough!」

LABEL: 0xBA5
STRING: I couldn't help but lose my temper at her indiscreet joke.

LABEL: 0xC48
STRING: Mocking Yukari's―all of our efforts...

LABEL: 0xC80
STRING: If it weren't for her, we'd be――!

LABEL: 0xCE1
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0xD04
STRING: I felt a hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0xD2A
STRING: My forward-leaning body, which was about to spring toward Reiri, was held in place.

LABEL: 0xDD9
STRING: Hiragino... Right, there had to be more important things I should be doing right now.

LABEL: 0xE15
STRING: Violence wouldn't solve anything.

LABEL: 0xE61
STRING: Raising my eyes, I saw Reiri grinning maliciously.

LABEL: 0xE99
STRING: It was less like she was actually amused and more like she was challenging me.

LABEL: 0xEF1
STRING: What was she thinking?

LABEL: 0xF1D
STRING: What was the point of all this?

LABEL: 0xF4B
STRING: What was she trying to make me angry for?

LABEL: 0xF81
STRING: What was she trying to make me say?

LABEL: 0x1006
STRING: 「...Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: 「What did you do?」

LABEL: 0x1053
STRING: 「...Nothing.」

LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: 「What are you trying to accomplish?」

LABEL: 0x10AB
STRING: 「...That's not it.」

LABEL: 0x10E6
STRING: 「Who are you?」

LABEL: 0x119B
STRING: Reiri then cast her eyes down in satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x11CD
STRING: Our dialogue relied on context for its power, and the words themselves were meaningless.

LABEL: 0x120B
STRING: It was nothing but proper Zen dialogue.

LABEL: 0x1255
STRING: Tokiwa raised her hand straight up toward the ceiling after witnessing our exchange.

LABEL: 0x130B
STRING: 「It seems we lack the pieces necessary to understand the whole story.」

LABEL: 0x1359
STRING: 「What exactly do you know, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x13D0
STRING: Tokiwa urged me to speak up, and I glanced over to Reiri.

LABEL: 0x147B
STRING: She was still staring at me.

LABEL: 0x14AB
STRING: However, her gaze was not one meant to keep me in check.

LABEL: 0x14E5
STRING: It was more like she was watching a clown fumbling around within a predetermined harmony.

LABEL: 0x156D
STRING: I no longer hesitated.

LABEL: 0x1599
STRING: Prompted by Reiri's eyes, I told them.

LABEL: 0x15D9
STRING: 「Everyone... listen to me.」

LABEL: 0x15FF
STRING: 「The one who sent that data from the library and interfered with our communication was――」

LABEL: 0x1645
STRING: 「――Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: 「I see. What a surprise.」

LABEL: 0x1767
STRING: 「You're lying――!」

LABEL: 0x17AF
STRING: Both of them were surprised... No wonder.

LABEL: 0x17D9
STRING: After all,

LABEL: 0x183D
STRING: they hadn't even thought that Reiri could do such a thing in the first place.

LABEL: 0x18EA
STRING: Yukari was speechless as well... Or rather, she was clutching her elbow in thought.

LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: Hiragino, who was similarly silent, opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x1A41
STRING: 「...Are you sure about that?」

LABEL: 0x1A70
STRING: 「I can't be 100%% sure, but circumstantial evidence says yes.」

LABEL: 0x1ABF
STRING: 「I know I can't ask you to trust me on my word alone...」

LABEL: 0x1AFB
STRING: 「That's why I want to hear it from Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x1B5F
STRING: And so, I turned back to her.

LABEL: 0x1BEE
STRING: 「Who the hell are you, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x1C18
STRING: 「Why are you interfering with us?」

LABEL: 0x1C3E
STRING: 「...Tell us.」

LABEL: 0x1C8C
STRING: She looked straight into my eyes.

LABEL: 0x1CB4
STRING: Her gaze was unreserved as if she could see right through me.

LABEL: 0x1D02
STRING: Finally, Reiri narrowed her eyes and twisted her mouth.

LABEL: 0x1DA0
STRING: 「It's essentially the same reason you sank this ship.」

LABEL: 0x1DDF
STRING: 「...How do you know that?」

LABEL: 0x1E0D
STRING: Reiri did not answer.

LABEL: 0x1E2B
STRING: She should've still been asleep when I revealed that I had changed the course of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x1E84
STRING: Did someone who was there―for example, Touri or Hiragino―tell Reiri?

LABEL: 0x1F3C
STRING: ...No, that was unlikely.

LABEL: 0x1F6C
STRING: She knew something she wasn't supposed to... This wasn't the first time that had happened.

LABEL: 0x1FC4
STRING: She had a perfect grasp of the layout of the ship as well...

LABEL: 0x2007
STRING: She didn't seem to have heard these things from anyone. She already knew.

LABEL: 0x2047
STRING: In the first place, what kind of connections did she have to get a ticket to this ship?

LABEL: 0x20F1
STRING: What kind of a relationship did Reiri have with the <SHEEP III>...?

LABEL: 0x2290
STRING: 「...I remember now.」

LABEL: 0x22B9
STRING: Yukari, who had been pondering something in silence, finally spoke up.

LABEL: 0x2363
STRING: 「We've met before, haven't we, Reiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x23A1
STRING: 「――At ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x23C4
STRING: 「What――?」

LABEL: 0x23DE
STRING: Reiri had been to ROMLES?

LABEL: 0x240A
STRING: Was that... true?

LABEL: 0x2436
STRING: If it wasn't a misunderstanding on Yukari's part, then...

LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: I looked at Reiri in search of an answer.

LABEL: 0x24F6
STRING: 「I told you, didn't I?」

LABEL: 0x251C
STRING: 「That I was tired of hearing your introductions.」

LABEL: 0x254D
STRING: ――Confirmation.

LABEL: 0x2565
STRING: Just as Yukari said, Reiri had been to ROMLES...

LABEL: 0x25A3
STRING: But, for what purpose?

LABEL: 0x25C5
STRING: I'd also visited ROMLES since I was involved with the <SHEEP III>, even if I was just helping around the lab.

LABEL: 0x2628
STRING: It was a form of subcontracting that the laboratory and the professors had requested.

LABEL: 0x266E
STRING: It wasn't like my personal skills were required by ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x26B6
STRING: But, what about Reiri?

LABEL: 0x26E0
STRING: Had she helped them in the same way?

LABEL: 0x270A
STRING: Unlike a graduate student like me, she was just a high school girl.

LABEL: 0x2752
STRING: What opportunity would she have had to interact with ROMLES?

LABEL: 0x27B5
STRING: 「I guess she didn't just happen to visit on an open day...」

LABEL: 0x280A
STRING: 「Right. I don't know what she was up to,

LABEL: 0x2844
STRING: so maybe she didn't come there that often.」

LABEL: 0x288A
STRING: 「However, she was definitely there for some kind of meeting.」

LABEL: 0x2925
STRING: 「I seem to remember that there were a few guards with her, too.」

LABEL: 0x298F
STRING: To be treated in such a grand manner was not something they would do for a random high schooler.

LABEL: 0x2A5B
STRING: 「Reiri-san. I want to ask you something, too.」

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: 「What do you know, and what are you trying to do?」

LABEL: 0x2AD5
STRING: 「If there was any intention behind that earlier interference――」

LABEL: 0x2B14
STRING: As if to interrupt Yukari's questioning...

LABEL: 0x2B38
STRING: Reiri quietly held up the palm of her hand.

LABEL: 0x2B64
STRING: In the silence that fell, Reiri's voice drew a single string.

LABEL: 0x2C06
STRING: 「All of you should realize that you don't know any more than you think you do.」

LABEL: 0x2C6B
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x2CF9
STRING: 「Do you really think Katagiri rewrote the program and changed the course of the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x2E4E
STRING: 「Think about it.」

LABEL: 0x2E6C
STRING: 「No matter how capable he is, do you think that's possible?」

LABEL: 0x2EB4
STRING: 「Is it really that easy to break through the security of ROMLES' navigation program?」

LABEL: 0x2F11
STRING: I had never even questioned it.

LABEL: 0x2F3F
STRING: Forging the keycard, manipulating the navigation times, altering the course...

LABEL: 0x2F89
STRING: Almost all of it was done by me alone, and I was actually able to do it.

LABEL: 0x2FCD
STRING: I thought I had been lucky.

LABEL: 0x2FF7
STRING: Somewhere in the back of my mind, I might have laughed at the fact that ROMLES' security was like a sieve.

LABEL: 0x30E1
STRING: But... was that really true?

LABEL: 0x310B
STRING: Had I been too overconfident and stopped thinking somewhere along the way?

LABEL: 0x31A0
STRING: A state-of-the-art submersible, from an organization the size of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x31D2
STRING: There was no way I could break through their security so easily by myself.

LABEL: 0x3224
STRING: In fact, I almost gave up many times... but as it turned out, I was able to break through in the end.

LABEL: 0x32C9
STRING: The hole in the security had been like a clean path.

LABEL: 0x3307
STRING: When I broke through one, another key would appear before me.

LABEL: 0x3343
STRING: It was like someone had been guiding me.

LABEL: 0x336F
STRING: As if a single bright star was pointing me in the direction of the stable.

LABEL: 0x33A5
STRING: And I followed it. I followed the clear back roads and breached the security.

LABEL: 0x33F3
STRING: No...

LABEL: 0x340B
STRING: Was I made to breach it?

LABEL: 0x351D
STRING: Did Reiri know about this?

LABEL: 0x354B
STRING: How could she――

LABEL: 0x356D
STRING: 「...Were you the one who built the <SHEEP III's> navigation program?」

LABEL: 0x3620
STRING: 「I've been looking forward to meeting you, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x3660
STRING: 「Thanks to you, I was able to get here.」

LABEL: 0x36FD
STRING: 「That's why I don't want to leave yet.」

LABEL: 0x3732
STRING: Reiri smiled loosely, almost jokingly.

LABEL: 0x375A
STRING: I heard a rustling sound from her throat.

LABEL: 0x3786
STRING: No one could say a thing to the laughing Reiri.

LABEL: 0x37BE
STRING: I wondered how much of her true feelings were mixed in with her words.

LABEL: 0x3865
STRING: Eventually, with a serious expression, she began to speak quietly.

LABEL: 0x38B0
STRING: 「Everything Katagiri said is correct.」

LABEL: 0x38E0
STRING: 「I'm the one who interrupted the transmission.」

LABEL: 0x3995
STRING: 「We can't be rescued right now――」

LABEL: 0x39C9
STRING: 「But, don't get me wrong.」

LABEL: 0x3A52
STRING: 「I don't want to die at the bottom of this gloomy sea.」

LABEL: 0x3A94
STRING: 「After I do what I have to, I'll definitely escape from this cage.」

LABEL: 0x3B31
STRING: 「It's just not the right time yet.」

LABEL: 0x3B86
STRING: Having made that unusually clear declaration, Reiri spun around.

LABEL: 0x3BE1
STRING: 「Reiri, wait!」

LABEL: 0x3C10
STRING: 「I won't wait.」

LABEL: 0x3C2A
STRING: 「You all need some time to think.」

LABEL: 0x3C58
STRING: 「Do what you have to do.」

LABEL: 0x3C98
STRING: Leaving those words behind, Reiri left the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x3CE8
STRING: We were all silent.

LABEL: 0x3D0A
STRING: Everyone was stunned.

LABEL: 0x3D2C
STRING: None of us were able to keep up with the amount of information she had just disclosed.

LABEL: 0x3D72
STRING: In no time at all, we were all left behind by her.

LABEL: 0x3D9E
STRING: Reiri had been in charge of constructing the navigation program for the <SHEEP III> at ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x3DEB
STRING: And I was able to rewrite the program

LABEL: 0x3E2B
STRING: because of a security hole she had left for me...

LABEL: 0x3EBE
STRING: However, its effect had exceeded my expectations.

LABEL: 0x3EFA
STRING: The <SHEEP III> had behaved differently from what I had intended,

LABEL: 0x3F45
STRING: resulting in an accident and sinking it to the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x3F83
STRING: I thought that was because of a miscalculation I'd made, or an error in the program.

LABEL: 0x3FC7
STRING: However, if what Reiri told us just now was true, then the real cause of this accident was...

LABEL: 0x407C
STRING: 「I'm... I'm going after her――」

LABEL: 0x40A8
STRING: She hadn't told the whole truth yet.

LABEL: 0x40DC
STRING: I didn't know how much I could trust her words.

LABEL: 0x411C
STRING: I couldn't tell.

LABEL: 0x4138
STRING: In Tokiwa's words, I was lacking the necessary pieces.

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: And, I was certain that Reiri had those pieces.

LABEL: 0x41B2
STRING: I had no choice but to ask her.

LABEL: 0x41DA
STRING: I turned on my heel to run out of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x4208
STRING: ――Touri grabbed my arm.

LABEL: 0x429E
STRING: 「I'm sorry!」

LABEL: 0x42BE
STRING: 「But please don't get mad at her!」

LABEL: 0x42E9
STRING: Her shout was desperate.

LABEL: 0x4303
STRING: Her desperate plea didn't match her docile mood from before.

LABEL: 0x4345
STRING: What was with her all of a sudden...?

LABEL: 0x4375
STRING: As I hesitated, Touri looked to be on the verge of tears.

LABEL: 0x441D
STRING: 「I'm sorry she's caused so much trouble!」

LABEL: 0x444F
STRING: 「But, she's not a bad kid!」

LABEL: 0x4475
STRING: 「Don't be mad at her!」

LABEL: 0x4493
STRING: 「Reiri... She's――!」

LABEL: 0x44B9
STRING: 「She's really a sweet girl.」

LABEL: 0x44E5
STRING: 「A nice, kind girl...」

LABEL: 0x450F
STRING: 「It's just that she's been like that ever since Mom died...」

LABEL: 0x45AE
STRING: 「So don't get her wrong, the real Reiri is――!」

LABEL: 0x45E5
STRING: 「I-I get it already!」

LABEL: 0x4613
STRING: I pushed Touri away by the shoulders, stopping her.

LABEL: 0x466F
STRING: What was the switch for her to get like this――

LABEL: 0x469B
STRING: When it came to her sister, like yesterday when she had disappeared, Touri really lost herself.

LABEL: 0x46F3
STRING: I snapped back to my senses and let go of her tense body.

LABEL: 0x4735
STRING: 「Sorry... I have no intention of blaming her.」

LABEL: 0x47DB
STRING: 「Right... Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x47FB
STRING: 「I'm sure she had her reasons...」

LABEL: 0x4837
STRING: 「But, she won't tell others anything and gets easily misunderstood... Even so, you have to believe me.」

LABEL: 0x48A2
STRING: Touri's earnest plea.

LABEL: 0x48C2
STRING: In response, I could only mumble a few words.

LABEL: 0x48F6
STRING: I had no idea what Reiri's intentions or goals were or what she was thinking.

LABEL: 0x4944
STRING: And because I didn't know what she was trying to do, this wasn't a question of believing or suspecting her.

LABEL: 0x49CD
STRING: 「...There's no point thinking about it.」

LABEL: 0x4A18
STRING: Yukari muttered.

LABEL: 0x4B05
STRING: 「I think it would be more beneficial if we tried to restore communications somehow――」

LABEL: 0x4BC5
STRING: 「That's going to be tough, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x4BEB
STRING: 「I have『no idea』where to start, at the very least.」

LABEL: 0x4C64
STRING: Tokiwa gestured in defeat like a pseudo-foreigner.

LABEL: 0x4CB0
STRING: Tokiwa wasn't a specialist in information systems...

LABEL: 0x4CFA
STRING: And against Reiri, who was familiar with the ship's navigation program as well as its security,

LABEL: 0x4D56
STRING: disabling the jamming wouldn't be easy...

LABEL: 0x4D88
STRING: 「...I'll have a look, just in case.」

LABEL: 0x4E1C
STRING: 「You can leave Reiri-kun to me.」

LABEL: 0x4E4A
STRING: 「The intricacies of the situation are, frankly, beyond me, but...」

LABEL: 0x4E8A
STRING: 「...Worst-case scenario, I'll carry her back.」

LABEL: 0x4EBB
STRING: He sure had a lot of confidence for a man that Reiri seemed to hate simply because he was a doctor.

LABEL: 0x4F29
STRING: Hiragino left the wheelhouse before I could say anything.

LABEL: 0x4F6B
STRING: ...Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0x4F87
STRING: I'd do what I had to do here.

LABEL: 0x4FB5
STRING: After watching Hiragino leave, I headed to the control panel.

LABEL: 0x528F
STRING: What needed to be done was clear.

LABEL: 0x52B1
STRING: I hit the keys and set a filter for unauthorized traffic.

LABEL: 0x5312
STRING: 「Did it work...?」

LABEL: 0x5332
STRING: Error text flashed on the screen.

LABEL: 0x535C
STRING: No authority... How was that possible?

LABEL: 0x5392
STRING: To begin with, I was accessing the system from Yukari's account, which meant that――

LABEL: 0x53F8
STRING: My fingers stopped.

LABEL: 0x5480
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x54A1
STRING: 「I think Reiri locked us out of the system...」

LABEL: 0x54D9
STRING: 「The only way to release it is to get Reiri herself to do it.」

LABEL: 0x5525
STRING: I was made to admit defeat in less than five minutes.

LABEL: 0x5552
STRING: That wasn't surprising now that I thought about it...

LABEL: 0x5597
STRING: The fact that I was able to breach the ship's security was thanks to her.

LABEL: 0x55CF
STRING: I had believed that my hacking skills were adequate.

LABEL: 0x55FD
STRING: That was what I thought.

LABEL: 0x561B
STRING: But maybe that was just a false impression.

LABEL: 0x564B
STRING: 「...A complete defeat.」

LABEL: 0x56D3
STRING: 「We'll just have to wait for Hiragino-sensei to bring her back.」

LABEL: 0x5719
STRING: 「We can persuade her after that.」

LABEL: 0x5789
STRING: Since all we could do was wait, everyone sat down.

LABEL: 0x57CD
STRING: Yukari, Tokiwa, Touri, and me.

LABEL: 0x57F3
STRING: For some reason, the conversation didn't continue between us.

LABEL: 0x5849
STRING: Tokiwa would usually brighten the mood by saying something incomprehensible or meaningless.

LABEL: 0x58B7
STRING: What was she thinking about now?

LABEL: 0x58E7
STRING: Her silence created an awkward atmosphere throughout the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x592B
STRING: At that moment...

LABEL: 0x5A95
STRING: 「Wh-What?! Did you hear that?!」

LABEL: 0x5ACF
STRING: A strange sound echoed suddenly inside the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x5AEF
STRING: Or was that... a voice?

LABEL: 0x5B0D
STRING: Touri looked at us with a frightened expression, asking for help.

LABEL: 0x5B45
STRING: I definitely heard something, but...

LABEL: 0x5B91
STRING: 「I heard it, but what the hell is it...?」

LABEL: 0x5C27
STRING: 「――It's the voice of a whale.」

LABEL: 0x5C4D
STRING: 「It's different from before, but whales talk in many different ways.」

LABEL: 0x5CA6
STRING: Tokiwa explained it plainly.

LABEL: 0x5CCC
STRING: Come to think of it, not only was she a physicist,

LABEL: 0x5D32
STRING: but she was also a deep-sea otaku.

LABEL: 0x5D56
STRING: ...A whale, huh?

LABEL: 0x5D98
STRING: Hearing the word "whale" made me think of another deep-sea otaku.

LABEL: 0x5E28
STRING: 「...Is something wrong, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x5E5B
STRING: Shoot... I was staring at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x5E91
STRING: Rather than being suspicious, she seemed curious.

LABEL: 0x5ED5
STRING: 「It's nothing...」

LABEL: 0x5EEF
STRING: 「I remembered something Nee-san told me a long time ago.」

LABEL: 0x5F29
STRING: 「"All sheep in the sea are whales."」

LABEL: 0x5FC5
STRING: "A whale is a sheep? What's that supposed to mean...?" Is what I used to think, but it now felt nostalgic.

LABEL: 0x601B
STRING: A memory so trivial that I wasn't sure if it could be called one had suddenly come back to me.

LABEL: 0x606F
STRING: I was sure I'd just trouble everyone if I shared something stupid like that with them...

LABEL: 0x6171
STRING: 「Well, I guess that's true.」

LABEL: 0x61A0
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x620B
STRING: Tokiwa was nodding her head.

LABEL: 0x6236
STRING: What was true, now?

LABEL: 0x62C4
STRING: 「A whale is written as "sheep" and "sea" in kanji, after all.」

LABEL: 0x6303
STRING: 「So that's what it meant...」

LABEL: 0x639B
STRING: 「You didn't know?」

LABEL: 0x63C8
STRING: Tokiwa looked at me with round eyes as if she was truly surprised.

LABEL: 0x6406
STRING: ...I felt kind of embarrassed.

LABEL: 0x6434
STRING: It never occurred to me that she was talking about kanji...

LABEL: 0x64E4
STRING: 「A sea fern is a "sheep," "sea" and "tooth," by the way.」

LABEL: 0x6514
STRING: 「But sea ferns are neither sheep nor ferns.」

LABEL: 0x6553
STRING: 「Then, what are they?」

LABEL: 0x6584
STRING: 「Sea ferns.」

LABEL: 0x65C1
STRING: I guess that was true.

LABEL: 0x6646
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head quizzically like I had said something strange, but she was the one saying strange things here.

LABEL: 0x66A2
STRING: 「...You seem pretty knowledgeable about them.」

LABEL: 0x6736
STRING: 「Yeah, well.」

LABEL: 0x6750
STRING: 「It's a hobby these days, but I researched them before.」

LABEL: 0x679E
STRING: 「Whales, that is.」

LABEL: 0x67BF
STRING: She said it casually, but... that was the first I'd heard of it.

LABEL: 0x67F1
STRING: I did think she was too well-informed for it to be just a hobby, but I didn't think she'd actually done research on whales...

LABEL: 0x6866
STRING: 「Whales are very smart.」

LABEL: 0x6890
STRING: 「Do you know how humpback whales feed?」

LABEL: 0x68DB
STRING: 「No, I don't...」

LABEL: 0x6901
STRING: Tokiwa, perhaps getting excited, began explaining enthusiastically.

LABEL: 0x69A9
STRING: 「Humpback whales feed on small fish like herring and mackerel.」

LABEL: 0x69F3
STRING: 「When they find fish to feed on, they circle around them.」

LABEL: 0x6A51
STRING: 「They then spin in a circle while spitting out bubbles.」

LABEL: 0x6A95
STRING: 「And, what do you think happens next?」

LABEL: 0x6ABB
STRING: 「The small fish, surrounded by air bubbles and unable to escape, gather in the center of the circle.」

LABEL: 0x6B15
STRING: 「A humpback whale then surfaces from right below the circle with its mouth open and eats them all in one go!」

LABEL: 0x6B89
STRING: 「They call it "bubble-net feeding" and...」

LABEL: 0x6C4B
STRING: Tokiwa stopped functioning.

LABEL: 0x6C71
STRING: Despite her talkativeness just now, she instantly stopped moving and froze in place.

LABEL: 0x6CD1
STRING: ...Was this some kind of a joke?

LABEL: 0x6CF7
STRING: 「W-What is it?」

LABEL: 0x6DB5
STRING: 「Sorry. I need to be alone for a moment.」

LABEL: 0x6E09
STRING: Finally speaking up, Tokiwa left the wheelhouse with those words.

LABEL: 0x6E64
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san...」

LABEL: 0x6E89
STRING: Yukari called out to her, but it was already too late.

LABEL: 0x6EB1
STRING: First Reiri and now Tokiwa... We all stared at the door.

LABEL: 0x6EEF
STRING: Tokiwa had changed in an instant.

LABEL: 0x6F1D
STRING: She strode straight out, wearing an expression I had never seen before on her face.

LABEL: 0x6F6D
STRING: What the hell was this about...?

LABEL: 0x7003
STRING: 「I wonder if Tokiwa-chan's okay...」

LABEL: 0x7036
STRING: Don't move around on your own――

LABEL: 0x705C
STRING: Hiragino's warning rang hollow now, but that didn't mean that danger had passed.

LABEL: 0x70B6
STRING: ...I couldn't leave her by herself, could I?

LABEL: 0x7104
STRING: 「I'll go check on her.」

LABEL: 0x7126
STRING: I left the wheelhouse behind me after getting a nod of confirmation from Yukari.

LABEL: 0x71CC
STRING: I'd bring Tokiwa back with me and wait for Reiri.

LABEL: 0x71F8
STRING: And then, we were all gonna get out of here――

LABEL: 0x7222
STRING: That was all.

LABEL: 0x7246
STRING: That was all there was to it...

LABEL: 0x726C
STRING: The maze-like path leading us to the exit,

LABEL: 0x729A
STRING: which felt like a stone's throw away,

LABEL: 0x7321
STRING: was still a long way off――
